data.title: Jimmy Castillo Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Jimmy Dale Castillo, 44, of Clovis, NM passed away at his home on January 17, 2024. Jimmy was born February 22, 1979 to Olga and Frankie Montano. Jimmy was born and raised in Cl...
data.text:
Jimmy Dale Castillo, 44, of Clovis, NM passed away at his home on January 17, 2024. Jimmy was born February 22, 1979 to Olga and Frankie Montano.

Jimmy was born and raised in Clovis New Mexico and graduated from Clovis High.

He was preceded in death by his grandparents, Julia and Margarito Castillo, two uncles Frank and Arthur Castillo, two aunts, Catharina Urbina and Guadalupe Hernandez, two cousins, Donnie Hernandez and John Castillo.

Survivors include his parents Olga and Frankie Montano, Arlin and Daniel Gallegos, brother, Johnathan and Cassandra Castillo, his niece Julia and nephew, Daniel and Angela. Six great nieces and two great nephews.

Jimmy was a loving and kind hearted person with a smile that would light up the room. He loved and cared for everyone with all his heart. He loved family, music, telling jokes, cooking out, traveling and playing games.

He will be greatly missed by family and everyone who knew him.

Pallbearers will be; Johnathan Castillo, Daniel Gallegos, Daniel Gallegos Jr, Manuel Hernandez, Tim Hernandez and Mago Hernandez.

A visitation will be held at Steed Todd Funeral Home Chapel at 12:00 pm on Friday January 26, 2024. In Clovis New Mexico.

Services will be held at Steed Todd Funeral Home Chapel at 2:00 pm on Friday January 26, 2024. In Clovis New Mexico.

Interment will follow at Mission gardens Cemetery in Clovis New Mexico.
